website_summaries.verdict: A premium booster seat that provides a safe, comfortable seating option for toddlers and big kids alike.
pros: Includes a quick-adjust nine-position harness with headrest for a secure fit
Offers multiple recline positions to ensure comfort and the best vehicle installation angle
Boasts removable cup holders for added convenience
cons: Booster seat may be too small for some kids

website_summaries.verdict: By far the best booster car seat on the market. If safety is your number-one priority, this seat is an excellent choice.
pros: Packed with every safety feature imaginable
Easy to install and very durable
cons: Pricey, but the safety features make it well worth the investment

customer_reviews.title: Protected my kids in a serious accident
customer_reviews.text: My two kids and I were stopped at a red light when a SUV rammed into us going 50mph. Which then pushed our car 20ft where we smashed the SUV in front of us. Airbags deployed, things in the car went flying, etc. My SUV was totaled, the SUV that hit us was totaled. My kids, ages 5 and 7, both harnessed in Britax Frontiers, walked away scared but completely unhurt. When I had to replace the accident car seats there was NO question what would replace them. These car seats protected my kids and allowed them to walk away from a serious accident. I cannot express how thankful I am for this company and their car seats.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thiel

customer_reviews.title: One major flaw
customer_reviews.text: Its good but with one major flaw that will require you to fix. The back of it where the belt runs back and forth will rub against your car's seat and make it very hard to adjust the strap when the weight of your child is pushing on it. The solution is to get a thin piece of MDF the height and width of the back to sit behind the Britax so that there is a smooth surface between it and your car. Britax could easily fix this by just having a piece of plastic protecting the belt, but they choose to save 50 cents and make you run to home depot and do it yourself. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just like my title says, we are thoroughly disappointed in this seat!! We have been customers of Britax for years. They are sometimes a challenge to use, but worth it because of the quality and safety. The harness straps would not adjust. AT ALL. We tried everything under the sun to get them to adjust. Nothing worked. We returned it, and got a replacement. Guess what? It happened again with the second seat. For $300 we just can't deal with how difficult these seats are to use. We returned it and opted to purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Milner

customer_reviews.title: Failed consumer reports safety test!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy. Shoulder straps get stuck and are difficult to adjust. Failed recent consumer reports tests. If your child is more that 40 pounds the harness may break and send your child flying. Look elsewhere. Britax stance is that it meets federal standards. Again look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Billy P.

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The lever to loosen the harness didn't work, so I never even had the opportunity to use it. While troubleshooting it, I followed the directions to lift up the seat cover so that I could look at what was going on. Despite a gentle approach in removing the clips, BOTH snapped off. Not a great sign of quality. I'm going back to Recaro.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: The one seat you will need for forward facing
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Frontier (car accident replacement) and 4th Britax car seat total. This is the easiest seat to install now with the click tight feature, and will make moving it between vehicles must less cumbersome. I wish they had that feature years ago! My 50-something pound, 4'3", 10 year old still fits in it and loves her "race car" seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Da Re

customer_reviews.title: Britax ClickTight or nothing
customer_reviews.text: Britax ClickTight models are the easiest car seats to install securely. We tried to buy some cheaper, smaller, lighter ones to travel with and had to return them because we could not get the seats tight enough to our liking (secured in the seat, not moving around more than 1"). With "Click Tight" you can get the car seat tightly secured every time with no fuss and little effort. These seats are bigger and heavier than most, which contributes to their safety rating. They are a bit of a pain to carry around but I have no complaints installing and removing from vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: 2ND seat
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Clicktight seat. We needed another seat for our 2nd car and I didn't even hesitate to get this one again. It has been absolutely awesome to move between cars. Super easy to install and super secured. I like the protection on the head that other seats dont have. The cup holder is pretty big and we have not had any issues not fitting a cup. Cleaning it was super easy also, my daughter threw up in one and I took it apart and cleaned it. No issues whatsoever with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: c.c

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Install!!! Love Clicktight System❤️
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best car seat! 5 point harness is great, the Clicktight system is absolutely amazing. We looked at the next one up (Britax Pinnacle Clicktight), and decided on this one, the Frontier instead. If you compare them side by side, you'll notice they have the EXACT SAME features. Only differences are that the Pinnacle is 3.5 inches wider and that it has the SICT (Side Impact Custion Technology) which is the main reason it is so much wider. Also, the Pinnacle is significantly more costly. More info on the Britax Frontier vs. Britax Pinnacle: [...] I am not affiliated with Amazon or Britax.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Solid, roomy carseat w/ easy install
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it, definitely a roomier carseat than the Marathon. Materials are ok, padding is better than cheaper "travel" brands, install is fairly easy once you get the hang of the whole "clicktight" setup. Armrests could use a little more cushion (according to kid) but all in all, would purchase again for #2 when the time comes. Easy install, easy pull out, easy carry (although it's not light), easy straps adjustment, easy back/headrest adjustment. Safety marks aside, this one was less of a hassle to use on a daily basis than anticipated (for which we are grateful).
customer_reviews.author: Oppentot

customer_reviews.title: Breaks per Consumer Reports
customer_reviews.text: Product was identified by Consumer Reports to break when in harness mode. We returned.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Sold on Click Tight.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Click Tight Britax seat and I’m thoroughly sold on the technology. We have Britax seats in my wife’s car and less expensive Graco seats in my truck. The Graco seats don’t hold a candle to these in regards to functionality. Click Tight is not only way easier than clip anchors, it also mounts significantly tighter to the seat. Britax seats are already nicer and more solid feeling than the competition but the Click Tight makes them a no-brainer. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: CalRal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CARSEAT!
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through several carseats, and this is by far my favorite. The clicktight feature is DEFINITELY worth it. It makes it easy to install the car seat, and gives a sense of security because once it is installed, the carseat doesn't budge. There are a lot of awesome safety feature that Britax offers, which is what lead me to choose this carseat. It is overall a good looking, safe, and comfortable carseat. Compared to graco, my son likes this one better and the 5 point harness does not bother him like it did with other car seats. Overall a great car seat and I would buy again for our future children.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Safety features and increased weight is a selling point
customer_reviews.text: I love this I feel like my son as extra safe with the click tight. We were in a bad car accident and had an Evenflo that car seat definitely saved him but we went with this one because it goes up and weight. I love that I could still use it for it much longer because the weight goes up so far my son is 90 lbs and has outgrown most car seat. Definitely worth the extra money for the safety
customer_reviews.author: Karizma123

customer_reviews.title: Great Car long term seat
customer_reviews.text: Great seat for when your child outgrows their rear-facing car seat and ready to forward face. Large sturdy car seat that your child can be in until they no longer need a car seat. The upper height and weight limit on this car seat is one of the highest, which means you can keep them in a 5 point harness longer. Additionally since in converts to a high back booster this could be the last car seat they need. The click tight system means that this is easy to install and you get a tight install every time. My kids also seem to enjoy having two cupholders each.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Klumann

customer_reviews.title: Great seat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my friend's 2 little girls ages 5 and 6. They are very difficult to put it but I guess they have to be for safety reasons. She said these will be her last car seats she will every need to buy since they are adjustable for different ages. So with that in mind, it is a great buy. Very stable and safe.
customer_reviews.author: aromaster1

customer_reviews.title: Good seats, click tight is tough to operate, but is effective.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and two Britax Pioneers. The click tight system helps the seats stay very tight. But, it is more slam tight than click tight. After looking at the mechanism closely, I determined how to press the door shut to latch. These look a little better than and have more padding in the seats than the Pioneer.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to tighten harness - avoid this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to save you all from having to read a long review - DO NOT BUY THIS CAR SEAT. It is near impossible to tighten. It’s in my husband’s Jeep and I avoid driving that whenever possible if my daughter is with me. The car seat isn’t safe since the harness can’t be tightened thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lee

customer_reviews.title: wanted to love it but didn’t
customer_reviews.text: i actually purchased two when my son transitioned to a booster style chair but i have to agree with the other negative comments that as hard as i pull the string- it doesn’t tighten! my husband had to take the seat out and re install which helped a little. i found that pulling the string UP instead of down made it easier. I did return the other as it wasnt open and used as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: SKM724

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Click tight feature doesn't work. Can't close these seats for the life of me. Wish I had chosen another car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for larger than average toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler who is way above average for height and weight. It is very difficult to find a five point harness that will actually fasten around her. This one does it! There is plenty of room left for her to grow even more before she is old enough for the booster part. Only downside to this car seat is it's very heavy. Easy to install tightly, easy to fasten the child into, cupholders - love the whole product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Flawed harness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat because I was looking for an easy install with a seatbelt. While the click tight feature is amazing- the ability to tighten and loosen the harness is awful!! This is the second Britax I have owned and both have had the same problem! The first one I returned because it was so hard to use it. I have kept this one but really struggle with adjusting the harness to fit my sons body. What a terrible design flaw to an otherwise great car seat.
customer_reviews.author: GabbyMcVicker

customer_reviews.title: I love Britax
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our toddler after growing out of his convertible seat. Well he didn’t maximize the weight we felt that he would be safer in this seat based off of our pediatricians recommendation for the specific we bought this for our toddler after growing out of his convertible seat. Well he didn’t maximize the weight we felt that he would be safer in this seat based off of our pediatricians recommendation for the specific seat.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Britax is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is a bit expensive, as a grandmother I want to be sure my grandchildren are safe. This booster seat is SUPER easy to install with the ClickTight feature. I feel that I'm doing the best for my "babies" when I have them in Britax.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in TN

customer_reviews.title: Straps won't tighten
customer_reviews.text: For the cost this is cheaply made. After a couple months the seems started fraying. The pull strap is impossible for me to tighten. My husband did and we leave it like that. But most of the time it's a struggle to buckle. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: sullyams

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a car seat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car seat because he can put race cars in one of the cup holders and his water bottle in the other one. Arm rests are nice for keeping the belts out of the way while he climbs in (so they aren't pinned behind him when I need to buckle him up). It's a little heavier than the Britax seat we graduated from, but the perks are worth it. Straps are easily adjustable and I trust this brand name. Expensive but absolutely zero issues with any of this manufacturer's gear.
customer_reviews.author: Zonzilla

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great in theory
customer_reviews.text: The clip that releases it from the seatbelt is too hard to squeeze, and I have a hard time getting the top to click back down to secure. It takes several tries to get it to snap into place. I have never had a problem with the other Britaxes we have owned, but this is the first we have purchased with this technology. It sounds great in theory, but I sometimes can’t do it on my own. The seat itself is safe which is my main concern.
customer_reviews.author: soccerbritt

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We love the car seat because of the Click Tight Technology makes it easy to install in any car. This is a great especially while traveling and switching Ubers. The weight is a little heavy but it's because of the steal used to make it which is high-quality material. The wings next to the head are great for my little one dozing off to keep his head from collapsing on his neck.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdplacemom

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks, rattles and makes too much noise
customer_reviews.text: Good size and easy to install but it is the most annoying car seat ever. The thing rattles and clicks when ever my son is not in it. It is so loud and annoying that I'm about to throw the damn thing out by the time I get to work and I only have to go 3 miles. My other Britax was so great that had too much confidence in the brand and didn't read up on this one enough. All the noise seams to be coming from the head support that is lose and flimsy. It is making me question the quality of this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: We are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Seat belt tightener is jammed and company will not replace, used once. We are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Waters

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the Britax Pioneer until I bought the Britax Frontier Clicktight....
customer_reviews.text: Hands down our favorite car seat. Compared to the Britax Pioneer, the Frontier's installation was a breeze - the clicktight system made it so easy! The Frontier sits very securely in our vehicle, even before the fastening the tether strap (the Pioneer had just a little wiggle prior to fastening the tether strap). Also, the Frontier clighttight offers a higher weigh limit than the Pioneer - which I prefer. All in all a fantastic car seat! So happy we made the switch. Our Pioneer has been demoted to our second vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Moetown

customer_reviews.title: Major Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Straps won't tighten. Have to buy new car seat now. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best choice in safety!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two child car seats to my twins, and they're happy with the change... they came from the Britax infant car seats (and Agile strollers), but as they grew up, we moved to these new ones. They are very sturdy and safe, yet comfortable. Very easy to install, and the click tight feature gives an improved sense of safety. I highly recommend to use them with the Britax seat protector, to bring extra grip. The fabric and finshing looks great and combined very well with our leather cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio ARIAS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Great seat and one of the only ones on the market that will fit my large 3 year old without compromising safety. With that said, for $280, the piping/trim sure should have lasted longer than 2 months. After 2 months, the piping behind his knees shows significant wear and fraying. Very disappointing considering the price point and that this seat was expected to last for YEARS. Obviously it is cosmetic and does not effect safety or functionality, but shouldn’t look this way after such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Keller

customer_reviews.title: Best booster seat and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Frontier Clicktight is absolutely the best booster available. Specifically it's a booster with a 5-point harness which is recommended for optimal safety. The issue with regular high back booster is when your child falls asleep in the car. Without the 5-point harness their heads will fall forward, to the side and their entire bodies can fall forward as the regular seat belt is flexible and does not keep a child's body upright. The Clicktight feature is probably the easiest car seat securing system I've ever used and you don't have to sit in the seat or put tons of pressure to make sure the doesn't wiggle. It's super secure and tight. Love my Britax.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to order this because I've been unhappy with the way the fabric held up on my convertible Britax, but eventually the safety ratings won me over, and I have not been disappointed. First of all, it's attractive. Solid feeling. The fabric is easy to wipe off, more like that on the infant carriers than the awful velvet stuff on the convertibles. It took about 5 minutes to install with the LATCH system, and no time at all to adjust to my son. It seems comfortable for him, and I love that it has two cup holders. Overall, I honestly think it's worth the extra $$ when compared to the cheaper competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic car seat. Love the 5-point harness option.
customer_reviews.text: Super car seat. Would never buy another brand. We started from day 1 with a Britax car seat that took my son from newborn to age 6. Now we have this and I feel so happy knowing my nearly 7 year old can still ride in a 5-point harness. The buckles work well, as with our previous Britax and don’t get sticky like some of the cheaper brands have a tendency to do.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tighten straps
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is really sturdy and easy to install. It has a great safety rating. The reason for 4 stars is I cannot get the straps to tighten right. They are hard to pull enough to get a snug fit. I installed according to the manual and still have the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love! I'm actually in love with a car seat! ;)
customer_reviews.text: Love love love... Absolutely love this car seat! How did I make it my child's entire life without it?! Ok, now that I got that out of the way.... It's easy to install(cannot emphasize this enough!!) slender in the back seat, made out of great quality material, and very comfy for my kiddo. I was hesitant because of the price. I mean really, people say they are all tested the same so why is it so much more expensive? Let me assure you that you get what you pay for. Everything about this seat is better than the graco I had before. There really is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install = Safe
customer_reviews.text: All car seats should be this easy to install. We’ve owned several models, many taking me as many as 30 minutes to properly instal. This car seat can literally be installed in two minutes perfectly and safely. After installing so many car seats, I now understand why people say that 90% of car seats are installed incorrectly. They’re impossible. Even if you have them buckled or clicked, they’re installed too loose. Not this car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Kirby M. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Open box had defective product but manufacturer easily replaced
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from Amazon as an opened box item to save some money. Came quickly & was in good condition but the click tight latch was defective. Guessing someone returned it without telling anyone something was wrong. I called Britax, the manufacturer, & they were very helpful & sent a brand new seat which arrived in 2 business days. Very satisfied with the product. It gets the tightest fit to the seat of any of the 4 car seats I have owned & the clicktight feature is the easiest seat install yet!
customer_reviews.author: jknight

customer_reviews.title: So he grew out of his Britax pavilion pretty fast. So we decided it was time for ...
customer_reviews.text: Oue three year old is bigger than most three year olds even bigger than some four year olds we know. So he grew out of his Britax pavilion pretty fast. So we decided it was time for a chair that would be more comfortable for him, I'm a big fan of Britax so decided on this one for him. He is so comfortable in it, no more tight seat belt anymore. Best chair for big kids he loves it best of all now he can see everything out of the window when we drive. Will continue to use Britax as long as our kids need them ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, we're confident he is safe
customer_reviews.text: This was our first Britax purchase as we've had the Chicco Key Fit and Next Fit leading up to this one. When it was time to switch into a 5point harness/booster seat, we did a lot of research and my husband and I both came to the conclusion of buying this in our own independent searches. So glad we did. It's sturdy and easy to use, and we feel like he is very safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: M Blue

customer_reviews.title: We own 2 and are very happy with this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I won 2 of these seats for my 3 & 5 year old sons. They love them. Comfortable, fit perfectly. Love the Click tight system. The only thing that I would say is a negative and a positive, is that it is bulky and very heavy. This is good for safety but it's hard to move and can't put them next to each other because of how big they are. I still would highly recommend and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for a big kid!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old is 3 ft 8 and weighs 55 lbs. He can crawl in to this seat with no problem and its very comfortable for him. The belts are a little bit harder to tighten than our old Chico Key fit, but the Britax is great and well worth the money. I feel better that he's in a very safe chair.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful investment!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for in car seats and I wish I had just bought this sooner. I LOVE the clicktight feature, I no longer dread moving my carseat between cars because it is so easy! My child loves it and it is so comfortable. It is also so super easy to adjust, no more taking the darn thing apart and rethreading straps! I'm so happy that I got something that is so safe and will grow with my child for a long time. I will definitely always buy britax carseats from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: I love this car seat and so does my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat and so does my daughter. I especially love the clicktight! I have 2 Graco 4ever, Britax Marathon and used to use the infant Nuna car seat. I love this seat for my 3.5 year old daughter! Thinking of getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Safe, comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair fit the car and child very well. My granddaughter at age 5 1/2 is happy with this car seat. I am also very satisfied with it's sturdy construction, safety features and ease of use. I would readily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Own 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 years ago for my oldest after extensive research. My kids are lean and tall so I worry about safety features and more about the depth of the seat than the width. In need for another seat for my youngest I decided to do some research again, not because I wasn't happy with the 1st one but in case there was a similar option at a lower price. The height and weight range for the harness makes it a winner for me. Long story short, I bought it again!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: the seat seems very safe & was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this seat for our daughter to use.. the seat seems very safe & was very easy to install. I will say that the seat does have a little bit of "wiggle" to it when it's installed in the car. I read a couple of other reviews that said the seat wouldn't budge & ours does move a little bit. We are using this seat in the harness mode & the straps are almost impossible to get tight... we just don't loosen the straps when we take our daughter out of the car now. Otherwise, my daughter loves the seat & the cup holders..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very safe, high quality materials, comfortable for child, and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this car seat if you love your children. The click-tight feature is a no brainer, easy to do and it locks your precious baby right down to the seat they're in. Instructions are on both sides in English and para Espanol. This seat is expensive, but after having this, I could never be okay putting my kids in Graco or any other car seat. This seat has multiple safety awards for crash test ratings, and it's convertible so it grows with your child.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Leduc

customer_reviews.title: Best forward facing car seat
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these car seats. One for all the cars my 6 year old rides in. He's 6 years old 60 lbs and 49 in tall. He's big for a just turned 6 year old. Easy install and lighter weight than others I've had. Love love love for extended 5 point harnessing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa von Marschall

customer_reviews.title: Heavy protective carseat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Britax carseats. Love the steel frame. It gives me peace knowing my kids are so well protected. That being said, steel makes the car seat pretty heavy! Much heavier than any CARSEAT I've ever carried. I also like the click connect feature it offers. Love the colors because it'll hide stains from my very messy kids! I Recommend this carseat to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lizwithkids

customer_reviews.title: The only one we will use
customer_reviews.text: My friend has this carseat for her 6 year olds. We bought this one as well for our toddler. It is great! We love the cupholders, the ease of use with the strap and adjusting the head height area for taller or shorter kids, and the fact we can use it for years. I highly recommend this seat.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Something this heavy should be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: I cracked the side head support (which is made of a material that looks and feels like styrofoam) just by leaning against it from the outside, to get something on the other side of my daughter's carseat. Now I have to buy a new carseat! For this money and this weight, it shouldn't be so fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Imfree

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Have a Diono Radian in my other car but this one is so easy to install once you learn how. Quality fabrics and my daughter fits in this fine. Seems like a quality product in materials and design. Made in USA... bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Britax quality at its best!
customer_reviews.text: After hearing my husband endlessly complain every time we needed to uninstall and then reinstall our kid’s car seats, we were thrilled to find Britax’s Frontier ClickTight seats. We now have four of these seats between both of our vehicles! Installation takes an easy couple of minutes, no swearing requires.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Best Booster Seat with Harness
customer_reviews.text: Great looking seat with 2 cup/food holders. Booster Seat with 5 point harness use up to 90lbs. Then switch to shoulder belt until 120lbs. Durable, fits perfect in my car, looks extremely safe when you install correctly. A little heavy, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love Britax
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat! I looked on many amazon reviews and finally settled with this onez I love that it has an extra safety method clicktight. It helps make sure the car seat is in tighter. Super easy to clean and very good quality. I will be buying more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: EASY to install and adjust!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is BUILT. From the straps to the material, to the ease of installment I am very impressed. As a mom of 3 boys we are looking for equipment that will LAST and can be passed down. We were in a car crash spring 2018 and after much research this is the seat i chose to buy after our crash when my mom anxiety was at an all time high. I researched for days before I bought this car seat. As far as I can tell this is the highest weight a car seat with 5 point harness will go up to.
customer_reviews.author: 3boymom

customer_reviews.title: Secure, easy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Britax of this model we have purchased and we've loved them. My two oldest use these currently, the are more comfortable for them and getting the carseat in and out is much easier than the models where you have to slide the belt through. The clicktight is smoother to operate and seems to hold the carseat much more securely. Plus, I trust other people to secure it easily if I'm not around, like the grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!!! I had a baby trend hybrid which I hated! This car seat my daughter loves and it's so easy to use the latch system or the click tight system which I like better. Just lift the seat put the seat belt under and click it and then put the seat cushion back down and done. Super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: After trying three other seats we paid the heavy price tag for this one. It’s amazing and you do get what you pay for! So easy to install. Feels secure right away and will last us FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: cupofjoco

customer_reviews.title: Best, easiest to install carseat!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I was able to install it in my vehicle in less than 2 minutes including the latch strap on the back. Amazing! It is very comfortable, easy to adjust for height, and tilts. It also has a cup holder. It is very heavy so won’t be your choice for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: VermontHikerMom

customer_reviews.title: When you want the best.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5-1/2 year old boy who is just 40 pounds and about 45" high. It fits him perfectly and was a breeze to install into my 2004 VW Jetta. The clicktight system is really great and I love that he can stay in a harness rather than using a lap belt. When children use a lap belt, they need to remain seated in an upright position and not leaning around picking up things. The harness system forces him to be in the safest position. I also like that it has two cupholders for his Chik-fil-et items!
customer_reviews.author: Guy M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I researched booster seats looking for one with a 5 point harness and again found that Britax is the best one out there. This one is comfortable. My son is tall for his age but thin. Even though he is 4 he still needs a 5 point harness. My child's safety is my top priority and this carseat gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: melissa a

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Carseat
customer_reviews.text: I like that this carseat fits them up until 90lbs in a harness for that extra restraint that is reason for this purchase. Very happy with would definitely recommend this carseat. Installment super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Matt

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this seat
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three Britax Frontier seats and highly recommend them. The last one was a replacement after we were rear ended. My son was safe and sound in his Frontier. I chose this seat for my parent's to have in their car because installation is so easy and adjusting the straps is easy so they can use it for multiple grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis E

customer_reviews.title: ... for all our my son's carseats due to their great quality and safety standards
customer_reviews.text: We have been faithful to Britax for all our my son's carseats due to their great quality and safety standards. We have 2 of these for our 4 year old. He felt so special when he upgraded from the Marathon. This has a more big kid feel to it. Seems secure and has been easy to vacuum and spot clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move between cars. I would suggest putting something that has a smooth surface behind the car seat if vehicle you have has cloth seats because it’s not easy pulling the strap to get car seat seatbelt tight.
customer_reviews.author: J Locke

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat, but straps can be hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this seat. My one complaint is that it can be really difficult to tighten and loosen the straps. We’ve tried adjusting and reinstalling the seat, thinking it was due to how we had installed it, but it’s still difficult.
customer_reviews.author: WittMer

customer_reviews.title: Easily and quickly secured to vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Clicktight system provides the most easily secured car seats out there. I don’t have to worry when someone else installs to take kids somewhere thanks to their designs. The only issue with this one compared to the convertible car version is the belt tightening for the children is difficult to tighten, whereas the convertible has good mechanical advantage to tighten this one requires two hands. That being said, we typically don’t loosen the belts when they get in and out so it’s not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clicktight mechanism is faulty!!
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with this carseat is the clicktight mechanism, which works erratically and is extremely frustrating. Worked very well in the beginning and now you have to say a magic mantra to make it work. Which makes it very difficult to transfer from car to car reliably, or take out and in for whatever reasons. I wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.author: Yael Reinharz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy seat!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat because it's so easy to install. It's a little heavy to move it in and out, but I like the stability it has. Our first one came with the foam a little broken, but I replaced it easily. The clicktight makes this car seat the best. The seat has nice padding.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M. Levig

customer_reviews.title: Not very portable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product vs. others as Britax is supposed to use less flame retardants than other major manufacturers. My son seems to like it. I do like that there are internal store spots for the accessories. However, this seat is very heavy, almost certainly the heaviest car seat I have ever handled. As such, moving it from car to car is very difficult, and bringing it on a plane is next to impossible, given the weight. Also, I wish the arm rests were padded. As well, the safety strap that goes into the car brackets is not very long, barely fits into my accord and I had use effort in order to get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F.

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn't hold up to everyday usage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these and love the seats the cord binding around the trim is shraying quite a bit. Only had the seas for a few months so Im quite disappointed at the quality of the cover material. Shouldn't be shraying from normal wear and tea usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ibemags

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that the belt installation was too loose and we ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the belt installation was too loose and we had to use the latch hooks instead. I only bought this expensive seat because it's advertised as just clicking the seatbelt to install it. Aside from that, it's nice
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Mom and kid approved
customer_reviews.text: My child has been using this for around 2 years. She loves it compared to the Chicco my fit harness booster in my husband’s vehicle. This britax is much more comfortable she says. Also, the installation process is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenally Easy
customer_reviews.text: Quality as excellent as expected from Britax I’m blown away how easy it is to install with seatbelt on the ClickTight feature in 5 point harness booster mode. I am thrilled that I will not need to buy another seat. My son will be 4 in 3 months and is 40 pounds so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: pab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Small Four Year Old.
customer_reviews.text: This convertible car seat is perfect for my petite four year old. We had a Britax Boulevard for her toddler car seat and loved it. She is in the 90th percentile for height but only the 15th for weight, so we were unsure which car seat would suit her best after she was no longer comfortable in the toddler seat. She loves this car seat and is very comfortable in it. She and I both love the cup holders. The seat converts to a seat with just a back without the five-point harness and then to just a booster so we can get years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: We love the safety ratings on them
customer_reviews.text: We only buy Britax car seats. We now have 4! We love the safety ratings on them. Although it is heavy and big, we love it. We especially like the click tight feature on this model. After installing it, the car seat does not budge at all. We feel our kids are the safest in their Britax car seats. The double cup holders are nice too so they can keep their waterbottles on the opposite sides of their siblings = no stealing the others water bottle = less screaming and fighting!
customer_reviews.author: asuafoa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat for my four year old with plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect car seat for my four year old with plenty of room for him to grow into. My son is special needs so having a harness is essential, this should last a long time. Also it surprisingly fit well into the captain chair seat in the second row of my Toyota Sienna. I was worried I would have to put it on the back row. I especially love the click tight feature, it makes it so secure that I know my child is safer. I highly recommend this car seat to anyone who needs to keep their child in a harness for a lot longer. I am so glad they make a car seat like this.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly A. H. R.

customer_reviews.title: I am on 4th child and this one is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Been through numerous car seats and carriers and have to say, this is the MOST impressive and comfortable for this last child. They have really done a lot to make them not only safer but more comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: Just switched my 28 month to this car seat. She is finally facing forward and loving it. Watched a YouTube video on how to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: A great seat for the money, hell for the price it better be right.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old child really loves this seat. The seat belt is really easy to put in and click it closed. The seat locks in very secure. I know that most people might over look this seat due to the price but it will last you for ever. This seat will grow with your child and I think I will get my money out of it. I really like that the harness goes all the way up to 90 pounds. I would like keep my child in a harness for as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: We love it, he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I practice extended rear facing and place high importance on car safety for my kids. We purchased this for my son who is 99% in height. We love it, he loves it. It's easy to install, comfortable and easy to latch. We have a different seat in our second car and this one wins hands down. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Always easy to install and adjust
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different car seats now, and Britax has consistently been one of the most user-friendly seats out there. Always easy to install and adjust. My only complaint about this seat in particular is that it takes quite a bit of effort to tighten the straps (e.g. you have to lock your arm and put all of your upper body weight on it to get them to pull tight). Seems like a little bit of a design flaw, but other than that I think it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy and awesome
customer_reviews.text: The Frontier is our favorite seat ever. After wrestling with horrible latch systems and bulky seats, this is a breath of fresh air. We have one for each of our older kids. The ClickTight is awesome. Yeah, the seat is heavy, but whatever. I'm not moving it that much. We road trip a lot and the kids are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and son likes it better
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves the ease of installation and use. Son loves his new big boy seat. He also likes the cup holder. He is small for his age and the harness allows him to move out of his Britax convertible seat and still be safe. I ordered a second for my parents' car bc they have trouble with installation too so this will be easier. Amazon has the best price I've found.
customer_reviews.author: K.Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love the clicktight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this car seat. The clicktight makes this worth every penny. It is so secure and my 3 year old loves how he sits up high in it. I will not buy another brand of car seat and I have had peg perego, maxi cost, Chicco and Graco. This is by far the best without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best Booster!
customer_reviews.text: Best booster car seat for toddler. The harness is great to add safety for older toddler. My son is on the big side and he has plenty of room. Cup holders on both sides! My son loves this seat. We bought two and both were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: KimB

customer_reviews.title: Best Carseat
customer_reviews.text: You can literally feel the safeness as you click it in and tug on it a little after it's locked. This is an easy in, easy out car seat, that is of high-quality material and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Safe but Terrible to Tighten
customer_reviews.text: The seat is comfortable for our 5 year old daughter, but the tightening straps on the harness and for the car are so frustrating to pull its not worth it. We have to switch between cars often so is a deal breaker for us. The Britax Advocate we had for her was great in this respect. Sending it back and hoping to find something better and easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat
customer_reviews.text: My five year old finds this seat very comfortable. It is so quick and easy to install, I don't mind having to switch cars if we need to. I do wish the button to loosen the harness strap faced the other way so my son could undo it himself, but it faces away from him so I need to loosen him. That is our only complaint, which is pretty minor!
customer_reviews.author: Laura N.

customer_reviews.title: 1973 Nova install
customer_reviews.text: I used this in 1973 Chevy nova. Worked great! Put it in the middle and the back strap that locks down over the deer took minimal effort to make it work in a classic car.
customer_reviews.author: Impaleale

customer_reviews.title: We are in LOVE!!!! Doesn't even budge!
customer_reviews.text: This harness booster is AMAZING! We bought a Graco for the one car that is not used a lot and this one for my car because I am in love with this brand. This is our 4th Britax carseat and this one takes the cake. You can't budge the seat, not even a wiggle if you tried hard enough. I'm amazed! My son also loves it. Its very comfortable and padded. Way to go Britax, you guys really made an amazing harness booster!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Frenette

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by the car seat specialist at our extension office. My daughter is 12 and has Down syndrome and this was the tallest 5 point harness car seat we could find for her weight. I like how the seat is made to easily get it in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wallis

customer_reviews.title: This is the best carseat! I researched forever to find the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best carseat! I researched forever to find the perfect booster for my son and I would buy this one over and over again! It is so easy to install and because of the Clicktight function I know it is installed securely every time. I also love how easy it is to adjust the height of the harness straps and it is very easy to get my son in and out. Loved this carseat so much I went and purchased the convertible carseat for my baby. Could not recommend this booster enough!
customer_reviews.author: blr_24

customer_reviews.title: Non-twist straps twist
customer_reviews.text: The click tight design is ingenious!!! It's soooo easy to install! Incredible! However I have to u twist the straps EVERY TIME we get in the car. When you have four littles that's annoying! The strap covers that protect their neck also come off. If you want straps that don't twist look at the Recaro. I also purchased the Recaro and it is easy to install and the straps do not EVER TWIST.
customer_reviews.author: Montanamama

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat we have ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying such an expensive car seat after reading some of the negative reviews on it but I have to say I am in love with this seat. This seat is solid and sturdy, reclines, super easy to instal, and very plush and comfy for my son. I hate what a struggle it is installing a seat and I hate when you have to take it out of the car because it's such a pain to put back in but with this seat it's a breeze and making sure it is securely fastened in all places was so simple. I also appreciate that the seat isn't bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

product_meta.title: Britax Frontier ClickTight Harness-2-Booster Car Seat - 2 Layer Impact Protection - 25 to 120 Pounds, Vibe
product_meta.description:
Safety, comfort and convenience make the Frontier ClickTight an exceptional Harness 2 Booster Seat. Car seat installation is easy as buckling a seatbelt thanks to the ClickTight Installation System. In the Frontier Harness 2 Booster Car Seat you are surrounded in safety. This booster seat features the patented Britax SafeCell Impact Protection system which includes a steel frame, energy absorbing base, V shaped tether to minimize seat rotation and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement in the event of a crash. Britax designed the Frontier ClickTight Seat with 2 strong layers of side energy absorption; a deep foam lined shell and head protection will shield your child from the most severe type of collision. Two integrated cup holders keep drinks and snacks within reach and are easy to clean between rides. The 9 position quick adjust harness grows along with your child and it's easy to transition from a harness to a belt positioning booster by tucking the buckles and straps within the seat. The Frontier ClickTight Harness 2 Booster Seat can be used in Harness Mode for children 2 years old and 25 to 90 lbs or in Booster Mode for children 40 to 120 lbs. Child standing height using the harness 30 58” and using booster mode 45 62”. Dimensions minimum 19 W x 28 H x 21 D, maximum 19 W x 36 H x 21 D inches. Seat width 12”. 9 Position harness slot heights 12.5” to 20.5”. Buckle Strap depths 7 inches or 9 inches. May not be compatible with all vehicles, see user guide. Armrests provide a natural and comfortable place to rest arms.



 * ClickTight Installation System ensures that everyone can install the car seat securely and confidently by just buckling the seat belt.
 * SafeCell Impact Protection is a safety system including a steel frame, energy absorbing base and patented V shaped tether.  * Impact absorbing base compresses to reduce the force of a collision.
    * Impact stabilizing steel frame offers superior strength where you need it most: at the connection point to the vehicle.
    * Patented V shaped tether minimizes seat rotation with a unique two strap design and staged release stitches that slow and reduce forward movement during a crash.
   
   
 * 2 Layers of Side Protection, formed by a deep energy absorbing shell, quick adjust head protection absorb energy and shield your child from the most severe type of collision.
 * Quick Adjust, 9 Position Harness and 2 Position Buckle allow you to easily move the harness upward and the buckle outward for a comfortable, secure fit as your child grows.
 * Multiple Position Recline allows you to easily alter the seat angle for your child’s comfort.
 * Integrated Cup Holders keep drinks, snacks and toys close at hand.
 * Easy Buckle System keeps the buckle out of your way when placing your child in the car seat.
 * Easy Remove Cover makes cleaning hassle free.
 * Hassle Free Transition from Harness to Booster by safely tucking away buckles and straps within the seat.
 * Compatible with SecureGuard Clip to keep vehicle seat belt properly positioned on your child’s hips when in Booster Mode minimizing the risk of abdominal injury (accessory sold separately).
 * Easy on/off lower anchors lock into place with a click and are easily released with the push of a button.
 * Color coded, easy access belt paths simplify vehicle seat belt installation.
feature_bullets: Toddler to Big Kid: Easily transition from harness to belt positioning booster as your child grows
Easy installation: Patented ClickTight makes car seat installation as simple as buckling a seat belt
No rethreading, ever: Quick adjust 9 position harness with headrest for a comfortable, secure fit
Surrounded in safety: 2 layers of side impact protection, steel frame, impact absorbing base, and forward movement reducing v shaped tether
Fits: Forward facing harness mode 25 to 90 pounds, Booster mode 40 to 120 pounds; Maximum Dimensions: 19 W x 36 H x 21 D inches. Shoulder width -15.5 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars751 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
